channel.title: INall
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INall, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Smoking and Alcohol Raise the Risk of Breast Cancer
item.description: Breast cancer affects 1 in 8 U.S. women. Learn how lifestyle choices like smoking and drinking may influence your risk and what you can do about it.

item.title: Joe Biden Diagnosed With Prostate Cancer

item.title: Pharma giant Regeneron to buy 23andMe and its customers’ data for $256M
item.description: 23andMe was sold by bankruptcy auction, a year after the company had a massive data breach.

item.title: Simple Ways to Breathe Easier Indoors
I’m 72 and my wife is 57. We have $4.5 million in assets. Should she retire sooner — or should I go back to work?
item.description: With millions of dollars in assets, the decision comes down to lifestyle in or out of retirement.

item.title: A Minecraft Movie Breaks Into Another All-Time Box Office After One Month As It Nears Passing Another Jack Black Hit
item.description: A Minecraft Movie has been one of 2025's biggest successes so far, and its box office numbers have just been boosted again, giving it another record.

item.title: ‘I’m an idiot’: I’m middle aged, earn $68,000 a year and have $39,000 in credit-card debt
item.description: “I plan on keeping the accounts open to protect my credit, but I will cut and toss all the cards so I can’t use them.”

item.title: My father’s widow keeps sending me $200 checks in the mail. Why would she do this?
item.description: “I sent a ‘thank you’ card and asked what it was for, but I got no answer.”

item.title: Martin Scorsese's Taxi Driver Has The Same Story As This Classic John Wayne Western Movie
item.description: Martin Scorsese's Taxi Driver owes a lot to a John Wayne movie, as Travis Bickle is an updated version of The Duke’s classic character.
